full_summary:
### Comprehensive Scan of Delinquency and Default Mitigation Activities
#### Tender Information
* **Reference Number**: cb-926-82836846
* **Amendment Number**: 5
* **Solicitation Number**: 100023951
* **Publication Date**: December 4, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 29, 2023, 2:00 PM (EST)
* **Contracting Entity**: Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 140 Promenade du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0J9, Canada
* **Contact Information**:
	+ Name: Joshua De Sousa
	+ Email: nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca
	+ Phone: (343) 543-8997

#### Project Description
Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) invites bidders to provide services for a comprehensive scan of federal-provincial-territorial delinquency and default mitigation activities. The Contractor will develop an inventory of these activities across Canada and produce an analytical report on their effectiveness over the past ten (10) years. The report will utilize a Gender-based Analysis Plus (GBA+) lens and include methodologies to answer key questions.

#### Key Requirements
* Develop a comprehensive inventory of delinquency and default mitigation activities across Canada
* Produce an analytical report on the effectiveness of these activities at the federal, provincial, and territorial levels
* Utilize a Gender-based Analysis Plus (GBA+) lens in the report
* Develop methodologies to answer key questions in the report

#### Evaluation Criteria
The selection of the Contractor will be based on a combination of technical merit and price, with the highest combined rating determining the winner.

#### Notice and Attachments
The tender notice and attachments can be found on the Canada Buys website, with the following links:
* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26602/100023951-npp%2804-dec-23.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26602/100023951-apm%2804-dec-23.pdf
Note: The notice and attachments are available in both English and French.
